statements: SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_expenses;
SELECT expense_date, amount, category FROM digital_nomads_expenses;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_description, amount FROM digital_nomads_expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM digital_nomads_expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT schema_id, expense_date, expense_description, amount, category FROM digital_nomads_expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_expenses WHERE category = 'food' AND expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT expense_description, category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM digital_nomads_expenses GROUP BY expense_description, category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM digital_nomads_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2021-08-01' GROUP BY category HAVING total_expenses > 5
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM digital_nomads_expenses WHERE amount < 50
SELECT id, description, amount, category, date FROM expenses;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT description, category, date FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, description, category FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, description, amount, category FROM expenses JOIN users ON expenses.id = users.id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT users.username, expenses.description, expenses.amount FROM expenses INNER JOIN users ON expenses.id = users.id WHERE users.email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM digital_nomad_expenses
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, expense_date FROM digital_nomad_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_expenses WHERE expense_name LIKE '%travel%'
SELECT e.expense_id, e.expense_name, c.category_name FROM digital_nomad_expenses e JOIN expense_categories c ON e.expense_id = c.category_id
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM digital_nomad_expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM expense_categories JOIN digital_nomad_expenses ON expense_categories.category_id = digital_nomad_expenses.expense_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_expenses > 1
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, category_name FROM digital_nomad_expenses JOIN expense_categories ON digital_nomad_expenses.expense_id = expense_categories.category_id
SELECT expense_name, tag_name FROM digital_nomad_expenses JOIN expense_tags ON digital_nomad_expenses.expense_id = expense_tags.tag_id ORDER BY expense_name ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT expense_date, amount FROM expense_records WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expense_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expense_records;
SELECT user_id, amount, category FROM expense_records WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%food%';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, expense_date, amount FROM expense_records WHERE user_id = 3 AND amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT description FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT u.username, e.date, e.amount FROM users u JOIN user_expenses ue ON u.id = ue.user_id JOIN expenses e ON ue.expense_id = e.id;
SELECT e.id, e.date, c.name AS category_name FROM expenses e JOIN categories c ON e.category = c.id ORDER BY e.amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM expenses WHERE category='Food';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT u.username, e.date, e.amount FROM users u JOIN user_expenses ue ON u.id = ue.user_id JOIN expenses e ON ue.expense_id = e.id;
SELECT u.username, e.date, e.amount, c.name AS category FROM users u JOIN user_expenses ue ON u.id = ue.user_id JOIN expenses e ON ue.expense_id = e.id JOIN categories c ON e.category = c.id;
